channel.title: Creating Construction Error
channel.description: TTRying to make construction from the tutorial here http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/383114-pi-construction.html and got these errors. [img]http://i.imgur.com/irWrQ7T.png[/img] and heres the clickingobject code where the error is [img]http://i.imgur.com/pAoAfEH.png[/img]

item.title: Creating Construction Error
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Camballer, post:6, topic:546067”]It would be structured something like this, depending on your base.

case ####:
c.getPA().startTeleport(####, ####, 0, “modern”);
break;

If you can’t figure out how to implement that then you’ve got a long way to go.

Edit: I just was rethinking and re-reading, and I realized that you may mean teleport them to their personal house, not just a house. Sorry I’m really tired. But you’d need to make something along the lines of HOUSE_COORDS and have it saved when a player buys a house, so that when they click the portal, it can teleport them to HOUSE_COORDS. It’s a basic idea, I just cbf to spoonfeed you. I’m not sure about the agent.[/quote]
LOL. Mate, you do know there’s actually a packet for this, right?
There’s a whole packet dedicated to making custom regions, and it’s primary use in RuneScape is Construction, and quest cut scenes.

Also, your help literally had nothing to do with the error at hand. But thanks for trying. It’s good to see people actively trying to help others on here.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating Construction Error
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

It would be structured something like this, depending on your base.

case ####:
c.getPA().startTeleport(####, ####, 0, “modern”);
break;

If you can’t figure out how to implement that then you’ve got a long way to go.

Edit: I just was rethinking and re-reading, and I realized that you may mean teleport them to their personal house, not just a house. Sorry I’m really tired. But you’d need to make something along the lines of HOUSE_COORDS and have it saved when a player buys a house, so that when they click the portal, it can teleport them to HOUSE_COORDS. It’s a basic idea, I just cbf to spoonfeed you. I’m not sure about the agent.

Read full topic
